## assertAlways() function

Assert that a condition remains true for the whole timeout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertAlways(testfunc: () => any, { message, timeout, checkEvery }?: {
    message?: string | undefined;
    timeout?: number | undefined;
    checkEvery?: number | undefined;
}): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  testfunc | () =&gt; any | The test function. Must return <code>true</code> to signal success. |
|  { message, timeout, checkEvery } | { message?: string \| undefined; timeout?: number \| undefined; checkEvery?: number \| undefined; } |  |

Promise&lt;void&gt;
